EmailTemplate.name: New community user activation email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to SunPower Partner Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to SunPower Partner Portal! To get started, please click here to create a new password. You will be logged in to our portal once the password is set.
For future reference, you can login to SunPower Partner Portal by going to www.sunpowerpartnerconnect.com and entering your username {!Receiving_User.Username} and password.
Have a Question? Email our support team at partnerportal@sunpower.com.
Thank you, SunPower Partner Portal Team
